item.title: Thoughts on Text Editor Design
item.description: This is a messy collection of thoughts about what a proper, modern text editor should be alongside some thoughts/planning for the implementation of such an editor. I pulled it straight from my personal notes, so it’s not cleaned up and was originally intended for my personal use. I’m putting it here so that I can more easily get some external opinions on it.
